WorkItem.Description:
Trying the new alpha WPF version and the tooltip flickers constantly when hovering over a gear icon in the gear list. When I say flicker I mean it is flashing on and off constantly and so quickly that you can't actually see what it displays, just a black rectangle. If I hover over the text description of the item it works perfectly though.

I loaded my character, hovered over the first item in the list (Stormriders helm) and it flickers. Tried scrolling list, different items, different gear types, they all flicker.

Comments.Message: Odd, I get this in the silverlight version and NOT the WPF version.
I get the same when hovering over a gear item.  However, the tooltip for me is steady as soon as I hover over the associated diamond.
